title: English Localization of Indie SRPG “Little Hearts” Made Possible Through DeepL AI Translation
description: In a significant development for the gaming community, the popular indie Japanese turn-based strategy simulation game, “Little Hearts,” previously available exclusively in Japanese, has been localized into English. This milestone achievement, made possible with the assistance of DeepL AI translation technology, opens the door for a broader audience to enjoy this unique gaming experience. Localization […]

title: China’s Strategic Pursuit of AI Secrets Unveiled Amidst Heightened U.S. Allegations
description: In a chilling revelation that transcends the realm of conventional espionage, the United States has raised the alarm on China’s sophisticated use of artificial intelligence not only for stealing trade secrets but also for turbocharging its espionage activities. The arrest of Xiaolang Zhang, a former Apple employee, merely scratches the surface of a broader and […]

title: Defra Announces Remote Veterinary Inspections for AI Movement Licenses in England
description: In a bid to streamline the process of granting movement licenses for poultry during Avian Influenza outbreaks, the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs (Defra) has revealed significant changes on the horizon. After consultation with industry stakeholders, Defra has decided to amend legislation, allowing remote veterinary inspections using video technology instead of mandatory in-person […]

title: Weekly crypto brief: Chainlink falls, Borroe Finance raises over $2m
description: Chainlink is down while Borroe Finance is trending higher in the ongoing ROE presale. Over $1.9 million has been raised

title: BRC-20 Tokens Exceed $110M 24hr Trading Volume on Gate.io
description:
The latest market data from Gate.io, a leading crypto exchange and Web3 innovator, shows that daily BRC-20 trading volume peaked at $116 million, with assets such as $ORDI and $PIZABRC increasing 17% and 245%, respectively. In addition, the exchange announced that BRC-20 tokens will now be included in its Proof of Reserves (PoR) reporting, which […]
